sources.title: The Jackals (1967)
sources.description: Bad bank robber falls in love with granddaughter of miner he and his men planned to rob of gold, has change of heart. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-jackals-1967/

metadata.Plot: Bandits target a gold miner and his granddaughter in 19th century South Africa. Robert Gunnar is the bandit with a heart of gold, who is after Price's cache of gold, but falls in love with Diana Ivarson, who has hair of gold (bleach).
metadata.Writer: Lamar Trotti, Harold Medford, W.R. Burnett
metadata.Actors: Vincent Price, Diana Ivarson, Robert Gunner
